resorts.name: Yawgoo Valley
resorts.description: Yawgoo Valley is Rhode Island's only ski area, serving the smallest US state with affordable skiing since 1965. The family-owned resort offers convenient access for Rhode Islanders and southeastern Massachusetts residents seeking quick ski sessions.

resorts.name: Ski Valley
resorts.description: Ski Valley was a small ski area in northern Rhode Island that operated until 1988. The area served the Providence metro before closing due to development pressure and inconsistent winters.

resorts.name: Diamond Hill
resorts.description: Diamond Hill operated a small ski area at Diamond Hill State Park until around 1980. The area provided local skiing before the ski operations ended, though the park continues.
